ModMetaData.name: Consciousness Affects Learning Speed
ModMetaData.author: Jdalt
ModMetaData.description: Ever wondered why Billy just took a charge lance to the brain and despite his survival already being a miracle, he decides that getting to Level 20 construction in a year is doable?\nThis mod changes it so Global Learning Factor is dependent on the consciousness of the pawn, making learning faster or slower depending on the consciousness.
